snippet.title: Survival: Fountain of Youth - Official Early Access Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Survival: Fountain of Youth heads to Steam Early Access on April 19, 2023. Watch the latest trailer to learn more about the story and see the tough times ahead in this upcoming single-player survival game set in the 16th-century Caribbean islands. The game will also be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S alongside the PC 1.0 launch following early access.

In Survival: Fountain of Youth, join Juan Ponce de Leon’s 16th-century Spanish expedition in search of the mythical fountain of youth. Stranded off the coast of the Caribbean islands following a shipwreck, fight for survival against the harsh elements, diseases, exhaustion, and other unforeseen hazards while traversing breathtaking locations in hopes of finding fellow crewmates and a means of escape.

#IGN #Gaming
